answers.answer: I think headaches can be a sign of high bloodpressure. I would call labor and delivery
Go to the e.r. and get checked for preeclampsia. That's a sign your body is becoming toxic.

I've had this as well. My doctor advised I take 1000mg Tylenol and if it didn't go away to go to l&d. I ended up having to go to get monitored. It's a sign of preclampsia call your doctor it you've already tried medicine.

Are you drinking enough water?I went to my check up just a couple of days ago because I have been getting headaches as well the doctor said that it could be because of lack of water since the baby takes so much from you but if they are really bad just go with your dr to make sure your okay

question: Hi ladies I'm a ftm I turn 37 wks tmrrw . and for the last three days I been having a really bad headache :( the only time when it doesn't hurt is when I go to sleep but as soonest I wake up it starts hurting again really bad were to the point I just want to cry and pull my hairs out :( . the only thing that helps a little is when I eat ice . it stops hurting for a couple of mins then it starts hurting again I'm also craving ice everyday . i haven't took anything . I already called my doc but she wasn't at the clinic anymore . I don't think I can go another day like this . idk what to do ladies :( idk if I should go to the hospital or not :( plz help !!
title: severe headaches for 3 days ! :( plz  help !
